title: In the future, will wars be fought autonomously with robotics instead of people? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think in the future WINNING nations will fight only with robots… I unless a treaty is made where only robots can be used in battle is drawn up the loosing nation will use fighting robots until they are defeated and they will then switch to human soldiers because that nation would probably choose to sacrifice humans than loose a war… Therefor only the winning side will only be using robotic warriors, losers will start with robots and when those are defeated human soldiers will face off with robots… which won’t be pretty…
